##p70 example
```{R}
setwd('~/lecture/riii')
tw2330 = read.csv("./data/2330.csv", header=TRUE)
str(tw2330)
tw2330$Date = as.Date(tw2330$Date)

tw2330_2017 = tw2330[(tw2330$Date >= '2017-01-01' & tw2330$Date < '2018-01-01'),]
max(tw2330_2017$Close)

summary(tw2330_2017$Close)

ordered_stock = tw2330_2017[order(tw2330_2017$Close, decreasing = T),]
```

```{R}
#merge進行資料合併

df1 = data.frame(CustomerId = c(1:6), Product = c(rep("Toaster", 3), rep("Radio", 3)))
df2 = data.frame(CustomerId = c(2, 4, 6), State = c(rep("Alabama", 2), rep("Ohio", 1)))

#Inner join:
merge(x = df1, y= df2, by="CustomerId")

#Outer join: 
merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = "CustomerId", all = TRUE)

#Left outer: 
merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = "CustomerId", all.x = TRUE)

#Right outer: 
merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = "CustomerId", all.y = TRUE)

#Cross join: 
merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = NULL)
```

### Flow Control
```{R}
x=5;
if(x>3){
  print("x > 3")
}else{
  print("x <= 3")
}

if(x>3) print("x > 3") else print("x <= 3")

test = ifelse(x>3,"x > 3","x <= 3")
test

data(iris)
iris$new_species = factor(ifelse(iris$Species == "setosa","IsSetosa","NotSetosa"))
str(iris)

x=5;
if(x>3){
  print ("x > 3");
} else if (x ==3){
  print ("x == 3");
}else{
  print("x <= 3");
}

sen = 'good morning'
sen = 'hi bro..'
if(sen == 'good morning'){
  print('good morning!')
} else if (sen == 'good evening'){
  print('good evening!')
} else{
  print('hello!')
}

for(i in 1:10){
  print(i)
}

sum=0
for(i in 1:100){
  sum= sum+ i;
}
sum

sum(1:100)

mat = matrix(1:9, byrow=TRUE, nrow=3)
for(i in 1:nrow(mat)){
  for(j in 1:ncol(mat)){
    print(mat[i,j])
  }
}

for(i in seq_len(nrow(mat))) {
  for(j in seq_len(ncol(mat))) { 
    print(mat[i, j])
  }
}

sum = 0;
cnt = 0;
while(cnt <= 100){
  sum = sum + cnt;
  cnt = cnt + 1;
}
sum
```

##p86
```{R}
mat = matrix(rep(1,9^2),nrow = 9)
mat = matrix(data=0,nrow=9,ncol=9)
for(i in 1:nrow(mat)){
  for(j in 1:ncol(mat)){
    #mat[i,j] = i * j;
    #mat[i,j] = paste(i,"*",j,"= ",i*j)
    mat[i,j] = sprintf("%s * %s = %s",i,j,i*j)
  }
}
mat

rep(1,9^2)

mat1 = matrix(1:9, nrow = 9);
mat2 = matrix(1:9, nrow = 1);
mat = mat1 %*% mat2;
mat
```

### Function
```{R}
addThree = function(a){
    return(a+3)
}
addThree(3)

#with default arguments
addThree_2 = function(a = 3) {
    return(a+3)
}
addThree_2()

addThree_3 = function(a = 3) {
    a+3;
}
addThree_3()

#lazy function
f2 = function(a, b = 2, c = NULL) {
   return(b + 1)
}
f2()

#local variable
b = 3
f3 = function() {
    b = 2
    return(b)
}
f3()

greeting = function(sen){
  if(sen == 'good morning'){
    return('good morning!')
  } else if (sen == 'good evening'){
    return('good evening!')
  } else{
    return('hello!')
  }  
}

greeting("good morning")
```
